name: @wontlost-ltd/aster-lang
description: A pragmatic, safe, fast language with human-readable CNL syntax that compiles to JVM bytecode

scripts.test: npm run fmt:examples && npm run build && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:golden && npm run test:property
scripts.test:golden: npm run fmt:examples && npm run build && node dist/scripts/golden.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:regression && npm run test:property && npm run test:fuzz
scripts.test:golden:update: npm run build && node dist/scripts/cli.js test/cnl/programs/examples/greet.aster > test/cnl/programs/examples/expected_greet.ast.json && node dist/scripts/cli.js test/cnl/programs/examples/login.aster > test/cnl/programs/examples/expected_login.ast.json && node dist/scripts/emit-core.js test/cnl/programs/examples/greet.aster > test/cnl/programs/examples/expected_greet_core.json && node dist/scripts/emit-core.js test/cnl/programs/examples/login.aster > test/cnl/programs/examples/expected_login_core.json
scripts.examples:cleanup: npm run build && node dist/scripts/cleanup-examples.js && node dist/scripts/format-examples.js --write
scripts.test:lossless: npm run build && node dist/scripts/test-lossless.js && node dist/scripts/test-lossless-golden.js && node dist/test/fuzz/lossless-fuzz.test.js
scripts.test:nobuild: npm run fmt:examples:nobuild && npm run test:golden:nobuild && npm run test:property:nobuild
scripts.test:lossless:nobuild: node dist/scripts/test-lossless.js && node dist/scripts/test-lossless-golden.js && node dist/test/fuzz/lossless-fuzz.test.js
scripts.ci: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run audit && npm run test && npm run test:lsp && npm run build && npm run fmt:examples && npm run fmt:examples:check && npm run test:lossless && npm run test:comments && npm run test:lsp-index && npm run test:lsp-multi && npm run perf:lsp && npm run perf:lsp:assert && npm run perf:layers && node dist/scripts/lsp-smoke.js && node dist/scripts/lsp-health-smoke.js && npm run lsp:workspace-diags:smoke && (([ -n "$CI_DEBUG" ] && node dist/scripts/lsp-codeaction-smoke.js --debug || node dist/scripts/lsp-codeaction-smoke.js) || echo 'lsp-codeaction-smoke non-blocking') && ((npm run lsp:missing-header:smoke) || echo 'lsp-missing-header-codeaction-smoke non-blocking') && ((npm run lsp:punct:smoke) || echo 'lsp-punct-codeaction-smoke non-blocking') && ((npm run lsp:streaming:smoke) || echo 'lsp-streaming-progress-smoke non-blocking') && (([ -n "$CI_DEBUG" ] && node dist/scripts/lsp-capmanifest-codeaction-smoke.js --debug || node dist/scripts/lsp-capmanifest-codeaction-smoke.js) || echo 'lsp-capmanifest-codeaction-smoke non-blocking') && npm run emit:class test/cnl/programs/examples/greet.aster && npm run javap:verify && npm run determinism:asm && npm run verify:asm:assert:listget && npm run verify:asm:interop && npm run verify:asm:sum && npm run verify:asm:intmatch && npm run verify:asm:intmatch:default && npm run verify:asm:classes && npm run verify:examples && ((npm run verify:asm:nullstrict) || echo 'nullstrict non-blocking') && ((npm run verify:asm:fuzz) || echo 'fuzz verify non-blocking') && ((npm run verify:truffle:smoke) || echo 'truffle smoke non-blocking') && ((npm run verify:truffle:stdlib) || echo 'truffle stdlib non-blocking') && npm run truffle:test && ((npm run ci:bench) || echo 'benchmarks non-blocking') && ((npm run native:hello:lenient) || echo 'native non-blocking') && npm run docs:api && npm run docs:build
scripts.ci:fast: npm run build && (npm run typecheck & npm run lint & npm run audit & wait) && npm run test:nobuild && npm run test:lsp:nobuild && npm run fmt:examples:nobuild && npm run fmt:examples:check:nobuild && (npm run test:lossless:nobuild & npm run test:comments:nobuild & npm run test:lsp-index:nobuild & npm run test:lsp-multi:nobuild & wait) && npm run perf:lsp:nobuild && npm run perf:lsp:assert:nobuild && npm run perf:layers:nobuild && (node dist/scripts/lsp-smoke.js & node dist/scripts/lsp-health-smoke.js & wait) && npm run lsp:workspace-diags:smoke:nobuild && (([ -n "$CI_DEBUG" ] && node dist/scripts/lsp-codeaction-smoke.js --debug || node dist/scripts/lsp-codeaction-smoke.js) || echo 'lsp-codeaction-smoke non-blocking') && ((npm run lsp:missing-header:smoke:nobuild) || echo 'lsp-missing-header non-blocking') && ((npm run lsp:punct:smoke:nobuild) || echo 'lsp-punct non-blocking') && ((npm run lsp:streaming:smoke:nobuild) || echo 'lsp-streaming non-blocking') && (([ -n "$CI_DEBUG" ] && node dist/scripts/lsp-capmanifest-codeaction-smoke.js --debug || node dist/scripts/lsp-capmanifest-codeaction-smoke.js) || echo 'lsp-capmanifest non-blocking') && npm run emit:class test/cnl/programs/examples/greet.aster && npm run javap:verify && npm run determinism:asm && npm run verify:asm:assert:listget && npm run verify:asm:interop && npm run verify:asm:sum && npm run verify:asm:intmatch && npm run verify:asm:intmatch:default && npm run verify:asm:classes && npm run verify:examples && ((npm run verify:asm:nullstrict) || echo 'nullstrict non-blocking') && ((npm run verify:asm:fuzz) || echo 'fuzz non-blocking') && ((npm run verify:truffle:smoke) || echo 'truffle smoke non-blocking') && ((npm run verify:truffle:stdlib) || echo 'truffle stdlib non-blocking') && npm run truffle:test && ((npm run native:hello:lenient) || echo 'native non-blocking') && (npm run docs:api & npm run docs:build & wait)
scripts.perf:layers: npm run perf:layer0 && npm run perf:layer1 && npm run perf:layer2 && npm run perf:layer3
scripts.perf:layers:nobuild: npm run perf:layer0:nobuild && npm run perf:layer1:nobuild && npm run perf:layer2:nobuild && npm run perf:layer3:nobuild
scripts.verify:asm: npm run build && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js test/cnl/programs/examples/login.aster && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js test/cnl/programs/examples/greet.aster && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js test/cnl/programs/patterns/enum_exhaustiveness.aster && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js test/cnl/programs/patterns/match_enum.aster && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js test/cnl/programs/error-handling/result_trycatch.aster && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js test/cnl/programs/collections/list_ops.aster && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js test/cnl/programs/collections/map_ops.aster && npm run javap:verify
scripts.verify:asm:intmatch:default:scan: npm run build && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js test/cnl/programs/patterns/int_match_default.aster && node dist/scripts/javap-scan-intmatch-default.js
scripts.verify:asm:intmatch:default:scan:full: npm run build && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js test/cnl/programs/patterns/int_match_default.aster && node dist/scripts/javap-scan-intmatch-default.js --full
scripts.verify:asm:trycatch: npm run build && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js test/cnl/programs/error-handling/result_trycatch.aster || echo 'trycatch emission failed (known issue, tracked)'; npm run javap:verify
scripts.verify:asm:lambda: npm run build && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles-core.js test/cnl/programs/lambda/lambda_stub_core.json && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles-core.js test/cnl/programs/lambda/lambda_call_core.json && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles-core.js test/cnl/programs/lambda/lambda_capture_core.json && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles-core.js test/cnl/programs/lambda/lambda_fn0_core.json && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles-core.js test/cnl/programs/lambda/lambda_concat_capture_core.json && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles-core.js test/cnl/programs/lambda/lambda_int_call_core.json && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles-core.js test/cnl/programs/examples/nested_lambda_core.json && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles-core.js test/cnl/programs/examples/nested_lambda_deep_core.json && npm run javap:verify
scripts.verify:asm:lambda:cnl: npm run build && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js test/cnl/programs/lambda/lambda_cnl.aster && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js test/cnl/programs/lambda/lambda_cnl_short.aster && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js test/cnl/programs/lambda/lambda_cnl_math_bool.aster && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js test/cnl/programs/lambda/lambda_cnl_mixed.aster && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js test/cnl/programs/lambda/lambda_cnl_match_bind.aster && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js test/cnl/programs/lambda/lambda_cnl_match_result.aster && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js test/cnl/programs/lambda/lambda_cnl_match_maybe.aster && npm run javap:verify
scripts.login:jar: npm run emit:class test/cnl/programs/examples/login.aster && npm run jar:jvm
scripts.login:native: npm run emit:class test/cnl/programs/examples/login.aster && npm run jar:jvm && ./gradlew :examples:login-native:nativeCompile
scripts.text:jar: node dist/scripts/emit-jvm.js test/cnl/programs/collections/text_ops.aster && npm run javac:jvm && npm run jar:jvm
scripts.cli:jar: npm run emit:class test/cnl/programs/integration/interop/cli_tool.aster && npm run jar:jvm
scripts.list:jar: npm run emit:class test/cnl/programs/collections/list_ops.aster && npm run jar:jvm
scripts.map:jar: npm run emit:class test/cnl/programs/collections/map_ops.aster && npm run jar:jvm
scripts.rest:jar: npm run emit:class test/cnl/programs/business/rest_service.aster && npm run jar:jvm
scripts.bench:all: npm run bench:truffle && npm run bench:java && npm run bench:jit
scripts.ci:bench: npm run bench:all || echo 'Performance benchmarks completed (non-blocking)'
scripts.truffle:run:core: npm run build && node dist/scripts/emit-core.js test/cnl/programs/examples/greet.aster > build/greet_core.json && ./gradlew :aster-truffle:run --args=build/greet_core.json
scripts.truffle:run:ifparam: npm run build && node dist/scripts/emit-core.js test/cnl/programs/control-flow/if_param.aster > build/if_param_core.json && ./gradlew :aster-truffle:run --args="build/if_param_core.json true"
scripts.verify:truffle:smoke:java: npm run truffle:smoke:nested:java && npm run truffle:smoke:nested:deep:java && npm run truffle:smoke:lambda:java && npm run truffle:smoke:lambda:deep:java
scripts.verify:truffle:smoke: npm run truffle:smoke:nested && npm run truffle:smoke:nested:deep && npm run truffle:smoke:lambda && npm run truffle:smoke:lambda:deep
scripts.verify:truffle:stdlib:text: npm run truffle:stdlib:text:concat && npm run truffle:stdlib:text:toupper && npm run truffle:stdlib:text:tolower && npm run truffle:stdlib:text:length && npm run truffle:stdlib:text:startswith && npm run truffle:stdlib:text:indexof && npm run truffle:stdlib:text:substring && npm run truffle:stdlib:text:trim && npm run truffle:stdlib:text:split && npm run truffle:stdlib:text:replace
scripts.verify:truffle:stdlib:list: npm run truffle:stdlib:list:empty && npm run truffle:stdlib:list:append && npm run truffle:stdlib:list:length && npm run truffle:stdlib:list:get && npm run truffle:stdlib:list:contains && npm run truffle:stdlib:list:concat && npm run truffle:stdlib:list:slice
scripts.verify:truffle:stdlib:map: npm run truffle:stdlib:map:empty && npm run truffle:stdlib:map:put_get && npm run truffle:stdlib:map:contains && npm run truffle:stdlib:map:remove && npm run truffle:stdlib:map:keys && npm run truffle:stdlib:map:values
scripts.verify:truffle:stdlib:result: npm run truffle:stdlib:result:isok && npm run truffle:stdlib:result:iserr && npm run truffle:stdlib:result:unwrap && npm run truffle:stdlib:result:unwraperr
scripts.verify:truffle:stdlib:maybe: npm run truffle:stdlib:maybe:issome && npm run truffle:stdlib:maybe:isnone && npm run truffle:stdlib:maybe:unwrap && npm run truffle:stdlib:maybe:unwrapor
scripts.verify:truffle:core: npm run truffle:core:long && npm run truffle:core:double && npm run truffle:core:await && npm run truffle:core:patint
scripts.verify:truffle:stdlib: npm run verify:truffle:stdlib:text && npm run verify:truffle:stdlib:list && npm run verify:truffle:stdlib:map && npm run verify:truffle:stdlib:result && npm run verify:truffle:stdlib:maybe && npm run verify:truffle:core
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run ci
scripts.docs:all: npm run docs:api && npm run docs:build
scripts.ci:timeout: npx timeout-cli -t 1800 -m "CI 在 30 分钟时超时终止" npm run ci
scripts.ci:strict: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && npm run emit:class test/cnl/programs/examples/greet.aster && npm run javap:verify && npm run determinism:asm && npm run verify:asm:assert:listget && npm run verify:asm:interop && npm run verify:asm:classes && npm run docs:api && npm run docs:build

author: Aster Language Team
